Interface GameEventPublisher

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleGameEventBus
public interface GameEventPublisher
Interface for publishing game events to registered listeners. Implements the Observer pattern to decouple game logic from UI updates.

Events published include:

  • Game initialization
  • Score changes
  • Brick updates (movement, rotation)
  • Board state changes
  • Line clears
  • Game over
See Also:
  • GameEventListener
  • SimpleGameEventBus
